title: Andrew S. Talks Family Ties to Bachelor Nation and Apologizes for Past Tweets
description:
“The Bachelorette” Season 17 fan favorite Andrew S. speaks in depth about tweets that resurfaced from his past and his difficulty adjusting to public scrutiny on social media. Andrew also opens up about his involvement in the drama on the show and shares why he didn’t want to involve Katie. Plus, Andrew explains the note he left Katie after their breakup and reveals whether he would ever be interested in becoming the Bachelor.  

Then, Becca and Tayshia discuss Katie and Greg’s gut-wrenching breakup.  

“Bachelor Happy Hour” has exclusive interviews every week. Watch “The Bachelorette” on ABC and listen to “Bachelor Happy Hour the next morning.   

Don’t forget to rate and subscribe so you never miss an episode.
